mapper.select: SELECT ta.TABLES_AREA_PK, ta.TABLES_AREA_NAME, ta.TABLES_AREA_STATUS, ta.TABLES_AREA_PXXH,ta.TABLES_AREA_NUM as TABLES_AREA_DW, ta.TABLES_AREA_DESC,COUNT(t.TABLES_PK) as TABLES_AREA_NUM FROM sc_tables_area ta LEFT JOIN sc_tables t ON t.TABLES_AREA_FK = ta.TABLES_AREA_PK WHERE SHOP_FK = #{SHOP_ID} GROUP BY ta.TABLES_AREA_PK ORDER BY CAST(ta.TABLES_AREA_PXXH AS SIGNED integer);
SELECT TABLES_AREA_PK, TABLES_AREA_NAME, TABLES_AREA_NUM, TABLES_AREA_STATUS, TABLES_AREA_PXXH, TABLES_AREA_DESC FROM sc_tables_area WHERE TABLES_AREA_PK = #{TABLES_AREA_ID}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sc_tables_area ( TABLES_AREA_PK, SHOP_FK, TABLES_AREA_NAME, TABLES_AREA_NUM, TABLES_AREA_STATUS, TABLES_AREA_PXXH, TABLES_AREA_DESC, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY ) VALUES ( #{UUID}, #{SHOP_ID}, #{TABLES_AREA_NAME}, #{TABLES_AREA_NUM}, #{TABLES_AREA_STATUS}, #{TABLES_AREA_PXXH}, #{TABLES_AREA_DESC}, NOW(), #{CREATE_BY} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sc_tables_area SET TABLES_AREA_NAME = #{TABLES_AREA_NAME}, TABLES_AREA_NUM = #{TABLES_AREA_NUM}, TABLES_AREA_STATUS = #{TABLES_AREA_STATUS}, TABLES_AREA_PXXH = #{TABLES_AREA_PXXH}, TABLES_AREA_DESC = #{TABLES_AREA_DESC}, UPDATE_TIME = NOW(), UPDATE_BY = #{UPDATE_BY} WHERE TABLES_AREA_PK = #{TABLES_AREA_ID}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(TABLES_AREA_PK) AS area_count FROM sc_tables_area WHERE SHOP_FK = #{SHOP_ID};
